bibl.title: The "Women's Tradition" in Greek Poetry.
bibl.note: I. A poetic tradition? - II. The list [of 9 female poets]. - III. Common interests and approaches in women's poetry. - IV. Women's poetic performances. - V. Survival. - VI. References to female predecessors. - VII. Conclusions. - Bibliography.
